name: bug
description: The issue is a bug report.

name: closable
description: Requests that the issue be closed by the repository maintainers.

name: Discussion Needed
description: The issue or PR needs to be reviewed by the OSCAL development team.

name: duplicate
description: The issue duplicates another issue.

name: enhancement
description: The issue adds a new feature, capability, or artifact to the repository.

name: Epic
description: The issue represents a collection of issues to be worked on over a series of sprints

name: help wanted
description: The NIST OSCAL team needs help from the community with this issue.

name: invalid
description: The issue is not resolvable in any way.

name: LoE: Large
description: The issue will require more than 20 hours to address.

name: LoE: Medium
description: The issue will require more than 8 hours and up to 20 hours to address.

name: LoE: Small
description: The issue will require up to 8 hours to address.

name: ongoing effort
description: The issue represents a long-term task that has no end or acceptance criteria.

name: question
description: The issue contains a question that needs to be answered.

name: Scope: CI/CD
description: A task issue to modify the repo's continuous integration and continuous deployment capability.

name: Scope: Content
description: A task issue to create or modify OSCAL content and examples.

name: Scope: Documentation
description: A task issue to create or modify OSCAL documentation.

name: Scope: Modeling
description: A task issue to create or modify OSCAL models and their related formats.

name: Scope: Metaschema
description: A task issue to create or modify the Metaschema modeling framework and toolchain

name: Scope: Repository
description: A task issue for maintenance and configuration of this repository.

name: Scope: Tooling and APIs
description: A task issue to create or modify OSCAL tooling and APIs.

name: Scope: Website
description: The issue is a task related to

name: User Story
description: The issue is a user story for a development task.

name: Waiting for Action
description: The issue is waiting for the assignee to take some action described in the issue's comments.

name: wontfix
description: The issue will not be addressed.

name: Source Document Defect
description: Track defects in source documents converted into OSCAL and stored in this repo.
